name: Lumber Harvest Tree Cutting Game
description: Become a lumberjack in this relaxing tree cutting simulation. Cut down trees, harvest lumber, and enjoy the peaceful forest environment. Perfect for when you need a break and want to engage in a satisfying, low-stress activity.
howToPlay: Click or tap on trees to cut them down. Collect the lumber by clicking on the logs. Upgrade your tools to cut trees faster and collect more resources.
features: Relaxing gameplay, beautiful forest environments, tool upgrades, and resource collection.
iframe: <iframe src="https://www.crazygames.com/embed/lumber-idle" class="game-iframe" title="Lumber Harvest Tree Cutting Game" allow="fullscreen; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

name: Golf Orbit
description: Golf Orbit is an exciting golf simulator game within our sports category where you aim to launch golf balls to incredible heights, even reaching Mars. Have fun in one-shot golf battles, complete challenging levels, and master the art of the perfect shot. Compete to become the golf king in this entertaining and unique golfing adventure.
howToPlay: Use your mouse or touch to aim and control the power of your shot. Release to launch the ball. Try to reach the target in as few shots as possible.
features: Multiple planets and environments, physics-based gameplay, challenging levels, and power-ups.
iframe: <iframe src="https://www.crazygames.com/embed/golf-orbit" class="game-iframe" title="Golf Orbit Game" allow="fullscreen" frameborder="0"></iframe>

name: Dalgona Candy Honeycomb Cookie
description: Test your patience and precision by carving intricate patterns into honeycomb candy without breaking it. Inspired by the viral Squid Game challenge.
howToPlay: Use your mouse or touch to carefully trace the pattern on the honeycomb candy. Move slowly and precisely to avoid breaking the candy. Complete the pattern within the time limit to win.
features: Multiple difficulty levels, various patterns to choose from, time challenges, and realistic physics.
iframe: <iframe src="https://www.crazygames.com/embed/dalgona-candy" class="game-iframe" title="Dalgona Candy Game" allow="fullscreen" frameborder="0"></iframe>
